message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn to decide!
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to start. What do you think?
I'm not sure 50/50 is the best deal for me. I'll think about it and make a counteroffer next round.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share this round, but I'm still looking for a good deal. Your turn to decide!
